title: Lake Meredith National Recreation Area: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Keep up with the latest park news               What can you learn from the landscape?               View photo galleries from the park               Learn about becoming a Junior Ranger         Â    A Changing Landscape Since 1965, visitors to Lake Meredith National Recreation Area focused on the lake and activities like boating and fishing. But over the last decade, the lake has gradually shrunk due in part to drought conditions and water use in the surrounding communities. This shows us just how important water resources are to local inhabitants - including humans as well as wildlife and plant communities.   Looking to learn more?   News Keep up with news and announcements from Lake Meredith.   Nature Lake Meredith is home to a complex ecosystem involving the Canadian River, wildlife, plants and fascinating geology.   Photos & Multimedia Browse through our growing photo galleries from Lake Meredith.   Kids & Youth Our programs for younger visitors are expanding in 2015. Join in!
